EventGhost.PythonScript(u'import hashlib
import atom
import gdata.contacts
import gdata.contacts.service
import re
gd_client = gdata.contacts.service.ContactsService()
 
# Change this obviously 
gd_client.email = 'artur@mymaj.net'
gd_client.password = 'Artu1n0!'
gd_client.ProgrammaticLogin()
 
"""
This is used like a case statement later on.
It's apparently a slightly slow way to do it but it just seems so elegant to me. I'm not a Pythonista at all though so there may be a more Pythonic way to do it that I'm not aware of.
""" 
rel_list = {gdata.contacts.REL_WORK: "Work",
 gdata.contacts.REL_HOME: "Home",
 gdata.contacts.REL_OTHER: "Other",
 gdata.contacts.PHONE_MOBILE: "Mobile"}
 
# This is the date used for "updated_min" below.
date = '1979-08-12T00:00:00'
#date=now()
print date
 
query = gdata.contacts.service.ContactsQuery()
query.updated_min = date
query.max_results = 1000
query['sortorder'] = "ascending"
 
feed = gd_client.GetContactsFeed(query.ToUri())
phonebk = {}
for contact in feed.entry:
 nam = contact.title.text
 comp = ""
# print contact.title.text
# print nam
 try:
 comp = contact.organization.org_name.text
 except:
 pass
 if comp is None:
 comp = ""
 
 if nam is None:
 nam = ""
 namecomp = nam + " - " + comp
 for phone in contact.phone_number:
 num9=re.sub("\D","",phone.text)
 if num9[0] == "1":
 num9 = num9[1:len(num9)]
 num9=num9[:10]
 if num9 is None:
 num9=""
 #print num9 + " = " + namecomp
 if len(num9) == 10:
 #print num9 + " = " + namecomp
 phonebk[num9] = namecomp
# Change this obviously 
gd_client.email = 'gochnamaj@gmail.com'
gd_client.password = 'Stokrotka21'
gd_client.ProgrammaticLogin()
 

date = '1979-08-12T00:00:00'
 
query = gdata.contacts.service.ContactsQuery()
query.updated_min = date
query.max_results = 1000
query['sortorder'] = "ascending"
 
feed = gd_client.GetContactsFeed(query.ToUri())
for contact in feed.entry:
 nam = contact.title.text
 comp = ""
# print contact.title.text
# print nam
 try:
 comp = contact.organization.org_name.text
 except:
 pass
 if comp is None:
 comp = ""
 
 if nam is None:
 nam = ""
 namecomp = nam + " - " + comp
 for phone in contact.phone_number:
 num9=re.sub("\D","",phone.text)
 if num9[0] == "1":
 num9 = num9[1:len(num9)]
 num9=num9[:10]
 if num9 is None:
 num9=""
 print num9 + " = " + namecomp
 if len(num9) == 10:
 #print num9 + " = " + namecomp
 phonebk[num9] = namecomp
eg.globals.phonebook = phonebk
def rel_type(rel):
 pass')

Macro.Name: SerialRECVD
Macro.Action:
EventGhost.PythonScript(u'import datetime
import os
import sys
num=eg.event.suffix
listnum = num.split(".")
co = listnum[0].strip()
ile = "nic"
if co=="Kominek":
 ile=listnum[1].strip()
 if len(ile)==4 :
 #print "usatwiam"
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue("temp",ile[:2],False,False) 
 if len(ile)==1 :
 #print "usatwiam on off"
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue("kominek",ile,False,False)
if co=="Tempout":
 ile = listnum[1].strip()
 num=int(ile)
 temp=num/100
 hum=num%100
 stemp=str(temp)
 shum=str(hum)
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue("tempout",stemp,False,False)
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue("humout",shum,False,False)
print co 
print ile
')

EventGhost.PythonScript(u'import bluetooth
import sys
bd_addr = "20:13:06:13:00:32" #"20:13:06:28:36:38"# "20:13:06:09:17:08" #itade address20:13:06:13:00:32
port = 1
sock=bluetooth.BluetoothSocket( bluetooth.RFCOMM )
sock.settimeout(2.0)
attempts = 0
while attempts < 4:
 try:
	sock.connect((bd_addr, port))
	print 'Connected'
	litera=str("f")
	sock.send(litera)
	print 'Sent data [%s]'%litera
	s=""
	data = sock.recv(1)
	while data != ',' :
		s += data
		data = sock.recv(1)
	print 'received [%s]'%s
	print len(s)
	sock.close()
	break
 except:
		attempts += 1
		print 'not conected'')

EventGhost.PythonScript(u'suff=eg.event.suffix
print suff
nazwa=suff[6:len(suff)]
print nazwa
if (eg.plugins.Webserver.GetPersistentValue(nazwa) == "ON"):
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue(nazwa,"OFF")
 eg.TriggerEvent(nazwa + ".OFF")
 print "OFF"
else: 
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue(nazwa,"ON") 
 eg.TriggerEvent(nazwa + ".ON")
 print "ON"')

Macro.Name: Status lampek
Macro.Action:
EventGhost.PythonScript(u'suff=eg.event.suffix
nazwa=suff[16:len(suff)]
#print nazwa
lista = nazwa.split(',')
aNum = lista[0].replace(" ", "")
#print aNum
#print aNum[:1]
if aNum[:1] == 'A' :
 cody = ['0','1','2','lampka','lampki','5','nowa','7','8','9','szafa','sufit','artura','gosi','14']
 Num = int(aNum[1:])
 action = lista[1].replace(" ", "")
 if action == 'On' :
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue(cody[Num], u'ON', False, False)
 else :
 eg.plugins.Webserver.SetPersistentValue(cody[Num], u'OFF', False, False)
')

EventGhost.PythonScript(u'
import os
import sys
#payload = "['192.168.78.11', u'6043171265']" 
phonebook = eg.globals.phonebook
ip = eg.event.payload[0]
phone = eg.event.payload[1]
msg = 'dupa'
if phonebook.has_key(phone):
 phone=phonebook[phone]
if '192.168.78.11' in ip:
 artur=0
 tell="Gosia"
 msg="msg * /server:192.168.78.14 Dzwonil " + phone 
else:
 artur=1
 msg="msg * /server:192.168.78.3 Dzwonil " + phone 
 os.system(msg)
 tell="Artur"
print phone
phone = tell + " dzvonee " + phone
#eg.plugins.BroadcastListener.Broadcast(u'telefon', phone, 8383)
eg.plugins.Speech.TextToSpeech(u'Microsoft Zira Desktop - English (United States)',0,phone,0,100)
try:
 print("START " + msg)
except:
 sys.exit()
sys.exit()')
System.Execute(u'taskkill', u'/F /IM msg.exe', 0, False, 2, u'', False)

Macro.Name: Get temp gleby
Macro.Action:
EventGhost.PythonScript(u'import bluetooth
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings(action="ignore", message='the sets module is deprecated')
import sets
import MySQLdb
import sys
def zapisz(lin):
 s=lin.split(" ")
 print(s[0])
 hum = float(s[1])
 temp = float(s[2])
 a1 = int(s[3])
 a2 = int(s[4])
 a3 = int(s[5])
 db = MySQLdb.connect(host="192.168.78.47", # your host, usually localhost
 user="artur", # your username
 passwd="dzikikot", # your password
 db="gleba", port=3306) # name of the data base
 cur = db.cursor()
 try:
 cur.execute("""INSERT INTO dane (wilgotnosc,temperatura,a1,a2,a3) VALUES ('%s', '%s', '%s', '%s', '%s')""",(hum,temp,a1,a2,a3))
 db.commit()
 except MySQLdb.Error as e:
 print ("Error %d: %s") , (e.args[0],e.args[1])
 sys.exit(1)
 cur.close
 return;
bd_addr = "20:13:06:28:36:47"
port = 1
sock=bluetooth.BluetoothSocket( bluetooth.RFCOMM )
sock.settimeout(2.0)
attempts = 0
while attempts < 4:
 try:
 sock.connect((bd_addr, port))
 print('conected')
 break
 except:
 attempts += 1
 print('not conected')
s=""
print('czekam')

while True :
 data = sock.recv(1)
 if data != "'":
 s+=data
 else:
 print(s)
 zapisz(s)
 sock.close()
 break

')
